## ACTIVE GENE SELECTION CRITERIA based on... 
# (1) riboZero RNA can be detected reliably for differential expression analysis 
## i.e. min. average of 3 t.p.m. over 3 consecutive time points (~30 min intervals) UP TO STAGE 13 (~12 hpf) 
# (2) RNAPII ChIP enrichment conditions (covering at least 80% of the genebody): 
## 2.6-fold at this stage OR 
## 1.8-fold at this stage AND 1.4-fold at next or previous stage OR 
## 1.4-fold at this stage and 1.8-fold at next or previous stage OR 
## 1.4-fold at this stage and 1.4-fold at next two stages 
# (3) optional: H3K4me3 mark within genebody 

## rzRNA data selection for RNAPII ChIP: 
## +/- 1h from ChIP time point, min. average of 0.1 t.p.m. (=detection limit) over 3 consecutive time points 

## ZYGOTIC GENOME ACTIVATION: 
# Total number of genes with transcripts: 12302 
# Number of activated genes at this stage: 117
